ai-tha-ap287:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap287:2.3_0: I shall be huge one by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap287:2.4_0: I myself did the mango trees.
ai-tha-ap287:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap287:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap287:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Makhāna.
